name: Memory of the Shadow
description: You have been reborn as a Knight in an unknown world known as the Realm of Eternity, see that the realm is slowly being corrupted by an Unkown Force. It's Your Job to find out what this force is and eradicate it. To save your new Home. However, the thieving locals are attacking you as well because they want to take your gear to make a hefty profit. So you are forced to fight them and anyone that gets in your way. (re-upload and the story is subject to change since this is a demo)
